issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

I have a scrioll view with different child views. In 2 of the child views i have hyperlinks.
I have another view(button) which has a zIndex value set to -1 so that it will act as a floating button for the underlying scroll view.

The hyperlink is clickable when i take a build on 5.2.2.GA ti sdk. But in 5.5.1. it does not work

comments.body: We cannot work with this issue...Please add a test-case, full environment and affected platform.
